§ 8901. Composition The Naval Militia consists of the Naval Militia of the States, the District of Columbia, Guam, and the Virgin Islands. (Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 486, § 7851; Pub. L. 109–163, div. A, title X, § 1057(a)(11), Jan. 6, 2006, 119 Stat. 3441; renumbered § 8901, Pub. L. 115–232, div. A, title VIII, § 807(d)(11), Aug. 13, 2018, 132 Stat. 1837.)
